answers.author: Chase Carlile
answers.text:
Attached is a copy of an RFP that Cameron County, TX used earlier this year for wind turbines and solar lights in county parks.  I hope some of the information it contains is useful.

author: Bruce Keiser
text:
Jamestown, RI plans to install a 1.5 MW wind turbine.   If your community has traveled this path, can you share your procurement documents?
Thanks
Bruce Keiser
Town Administrator
title: Wind Turbine RFP
